About Baja Fresh Mexican Grill Baja Fresh Mexican Grill is a Fast Food restaurant located at 340 W Dekalb Pike in King of Prussia, PA 19406. Baja Fresh Mexican Grill has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
